passives.name: Darkness Extension
passives.desc:
Darkness use +2

When using Darkness:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 â€¢ Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 â€¢ 6 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up
 â€¢ Self: 4 turns Power of Darkness
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack on target after use

Darkness becomes Darkness+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; self: 4 turns Light within Darkness) while HP less than 50% of MAX

While Power of Darkness active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee  PGattack +  PF attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; cancels Light within Darkness)

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRVã€? slightly raises ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRVã€? ATK

passives.name: Valiant Blow Extension
passives.desc:
Valiant Blow use +1

When using Valiant Blow:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ 8 turns slight boost to ATK Up
 â€¢ Self: 4 turns Power of Darkness
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use
 â€¢ Grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt

Valiant Blow becomes Valiant Blow+ (large BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; slight boost to BRV granted based on HP damage dealt; self: 4 turns Light within Darkness) while HP less than 50% of MAX

While Power of Darknessã€? Light within Darkness active:
 â€¢ BRV Attackã€? BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 â€¢ HP Attackã€? HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (melee  PG attack +  PF attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP; cancels Light within Darkness)
passives.short_desc: Valiant Blow Extension: Boost to Valiant Blow
